d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.07f62621-5fa3-462c-8726-e4aa05445947.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.1ad1deb9-803d-4a77-9f61-3fc79c73fba0.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.29598679-3577-47b0-9a22-6add5bb0a3e6.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.323c1859-f4ad-4e96-8294-3b17287a2883.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.38734164-3011-4bfe-a6ac-1a937aaaa6c4.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.3a0edb5f-01b1-420e-adf7-04295be7d4f8.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.421c635c-9d0f-4c3a-9dc1-ffa05fef9bdb.prompt=Process Instance ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.442f5f1b-8c9d-4314-9e04-48733a115e66.prompt=Resource Provider ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.52ea4578-6e19-4492-94e6-369415759f14.prompt=Component ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.66c0c9f9-8b1c-4040-b72a-6f7497a25cec.prompt=Artifact ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.6f3ca673-e20b-4c8b-b31c-a79e94153123.prompt=Component ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.70a7b3a4-6ada-4e34-a170-0ceb5d050e99.prompt=Process Instance ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.7129af3c-03d2-4c8b-9b43-aef6d217b2f3.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.786ea9c0-4f26-43ef-b5d4-2512d2cc086b.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.8d9ebdc9-4a29-4d3c-ae95-82b0b11cd19c.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.989d5d05-074d-42fb-84c9-b022b727182a.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.9cba230d-b05f-4cbb-8011-5c2d1efc5270.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.a4e9db7f-fcb0-409e-b0a0-4642c1658b4f.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.bdc6e4ef-a1b9-4a1a-bc80-55a1dcbb0537.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.bfd115c8-5f3b-42c4-83e0-4db19c652fc5.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.cb6be781-84c2-4425-9e2b-1d554d5eddff.prompt=User Identifier d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.cc9eb466-d96b-4527-a94c-114269f65e3a.prompt=Component ID d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.description=
Provision a  Simple Vcenter Linux VM from a VM template. 

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
d24e45f0-a00c-4fa9-b9a2-d259e5bb1be3.e9ad9a3f-6d79-454c-a324-a8777b233e46.prompt=Process Instance ID
flow.name: Docker MySQL Deploy
